text: Manley Caldwell Butler (June 2, 1925 - July 29, 2014) was an American politician. From 1972 to 1983, he was a U.S. Representative from Virginia. Butler died on July 29, 2014 at the age of 89 in Roanoke, Virginia. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2014 deaths Category:United States representatives from Virginia Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: M. Caldwell Butler
